episodes.title: Episode 039: Billion Dollar Insights – an in-depth interview with Dave Liniger
episodes.summary: It’s been said that Dave Liniger is the greatest franchisor since Ray Kroc. Founder and CEO of RE/MAX – the world’s most successful real estate company – and member of the International Franchise Hall of Fame, Dave gives a rare behind-the-scenes interview to Dermot Buffini, CEO of Buffini & Company.

episodes.title: Episode 038: The NFL’s Little Engine that Could
episodes.summary: NFL star, Justin Forsett shares his journey from poverty to professional football and explains the importance of service.

episodes.title: Episode 037: How to Love Your Life
episodes.summary: In honor of Valentine’s Day, Brian Buffini offers tips to help you love your life.

episodes.title: Episode 036: The One Decision that Makes a Millionaire
episodes.summary: Brian Buffini delves into the one decision that can help you build a fortune.

episodes.title: Episode 035: The Other Shore with Diana Nyad
episodes.summary: Diana Nyad shares her inspirational story of achieving success after failure and why you should never give up on your dreams.

episodes.title: Episode 034: Everybody Needs a Coach
episodes.summary: Brian Buffini outlines the three essentials of having a coach and explains why everyone needs one.

episodes.title: Episode 033: The Rest-Run Cycle
episodes.summary: Brian Buffini explains why rest is vital to lasting success and offers tips to incorporate it into your business.

episodes.title: Episode 032: Behind the Scenes with Dermot Buffini
episodes.summary: Brian Buffini interviews Dermot Buffini, CEO of the largest coaching and training organization in the US.

episodes.title: Episode 031: The 12 Week Year
episodes.summary: How we think about our lives and how we plan are critical to what we can accomplish. In this episode, Brian Buffini interviews Brian Moran, President and Founder of The 12 Week Year.

episodes.title: Episode 030: ‘Tis the Season
episodes.summary: Brian Buffini outlines why it’s important to reflect, reorganize and reload at the end of the year.

episodes.title: Episode 029: Building Your Happiness Plan
episodes.summary: Brian Buffini breaks down the myths and misconceptions about happiness and offers tips to help you achieve happiness in 2017.

episodes.title: Episode 028: Cultivating an Unshakable Character
episodes.summary: Brian Buffini welcomes special guest, Joe Niego, who outlines tips for developing good character, one choice at a time.

episodes.title: Episode 027: Gratitude: My Secret Ingredient for Success
episodes.summary: In the spirit of season, Brian Buffini outlines the benefits of gratitude and why it’s an attitude of the heart.

episodes.title: Episode 026: Mastering the Art of Listening
episodes.summary: In one of his favorite interviews, Brian Buffini explored how to improve listening skills with communication expert Steve Shapiro.

episodes.title: Episode 025: The Power of a Made-Up Mind
episodes.summary: Get motivated to succeed by making up your mind to win. Brian Buffini offers the tips and strategies you need to win in 2017 and beyond.

episodes.title: Episode 024: Living an Inspired Life - Part 2
episodes.summary: Are you living an inspired life? Brian Buffini shares the benefits of leading an inspired life and provides the tools to make it a reality.

episodes.title: Episode 023: An Interview with Alan Taylor
episodes.summary: Entrepreneur and “car guy” Alan Taylor shares his tips for success and why honesty matters.

episodes.title: Episode 022: Living an Inspired Life Part 1
episodes.summary: Are you living an inspired life? Brian Buffini shares the benefits of leading an inspired life and offers the tools that can make it a reality.

episodes.title: Episode 021: The Path to Mastery – Part 2
episodes.summary: Brian Buffini delves into the five keys that are essential to mastery from the best-selling book, Mastery by George Leonard

episodes.title: Episode 020: The Traveler's Gift - with Andy Andrews
episodes.summary: Andy Andrews shares his inspiring story and offers memorable lessons in maintaining perspective.

episodes.title: Episode 019: The Path to Mastery - Part 1
episodes.summary: Brian Buffini shares key insights about mastery from the best-selling book, Mastery by George Leonard

episodes.title: Episode 018: The Mentor Connection
episodes.summary: Brian Buffini shares his tips to find a mentor, be mentored and become a mentor to others.

episodes.title: Episode 017: Family and Relationships – An Interview with Brian and Beverly Buffini
episodes.summary: Brian and Beverly Buffini share tips on what’s worked well for them raising kids in today’s world.

episodes.title: Episode 016: Love and Marriage: An Interview with Brian and Beverly Buffini
episodes.summary: Brian and Beverly Buffini share their tips for a happy and long-lasting relationship.

episodes.title: Episode 015: An Interview with the Man on the Moon
episodes.summary: What’s it like to walk on the moon? Brian shares his interview with Neil Armstrong and gains insight into one of America’s most famous astronauts.

episodes.title: Episode 014: An Interview with Daniel Goleman
episodes.summary: Brian interviews world-renowned psychologist, Daniel Goleman, and learns more about the connection between emotional intelligence and great leadership.

episodes.title: Episode 013: Building a Financial Fortress
episodes.summary: Brian shares his strategies for moving through the financial sequence, from stability to significance.

episodes.title: Episode 012: An Interview with Tom Ziglar
episodes.summary: Tom Ziglar picks up where his father left off, offering motivational tips to help you build great habits and succeed.

episodes.title: Episode 011: Trust More, Worry Less, Enjoy the Journey
episodes.summary: What started as an appointment to find a family pet turned into a story Brian and his wife will never forget, and still laugh about 15 years later.

episodes.title: Episode 010: Managing the World’s Most Difficult Person
episodes.summary: Success relies on more than putting in the work, it’s also important to figure out how to manage the world’s most difficult person—yourself.

episodes.title: Episode 009: Ain’t No Mountain High Enough
episodes.summary: What was supposed to be a relaxing week bonding with his then-teenaged son turned into a challenging climb up one of the tallest glaciers in Canada…and a chance for Brian to reconnect with his “why?

episodes.title: Episode 008: 7 Steps to an Unstoppable Business
episodes.summary: More than 50% of small businesses fail in five years; yours doesn’t have to be one of them. In this episode, Brian shares seven timeless tips for building an unstoppable business that apply to all industries.

episodes.title: Episode 007: An Interview with Sally Hogshead
episodes.summary:
If you want to stand out in the market, it’s essential to differentiate yourself and show how you add value to your clients and solve their problems.

In this episode, Brian Buffini and branding expert Sally Hogshead delve into the most common personality traits and how people and brands can use their strengths to provide value and set  themselves apart from their competition.

Her new book Fascinate explores how to make your brand impossible to resist. Don’t miss this powerful interview and get  your free assessment tool - just for tuning in.

episodes.title: Episode 006: The Emigrant Edge - The Common Traits of Successful Immigrants
episodes.summary: There are seven common traits of emigrants who came to this country with nothing and built a successful life…in this episode discover how to live the life you’ve always imagined by tapping into the potential you’ve always had.

episodes.title: Episode 005: Brian and Coach Lou Holtz at Augusta
episodes.summary: A hilarious story of golfing coaching with a profound twist at the end

episodes.title: Episode 004: An Interview with Lou Holtz
episodes.summary: In this motivational interview from MasterMind Summit™, Brian interviews Lou Holtz. This master coach teaches you how to turn your goals and dreams in to reality. He gives you tips and tricks to stay motivated and how to be the best at what you do!

episodes.title: Episode 003: A Message from my Mentors – Jim Rohn and Zig Ziglar’s last ever appearance together
episodes.summary:
Brian Buffini digs into the archives of Buffini & Company’s MasterMind Summit® for this interview with his late, great mentors Jim Rohn and Zig Ziglar.

Jim and Zig spent their lives philosophizing, training and inspiring business leaders to realize and achieve their full potential. In this interview, they share their wisdom, personal philosophies and advice for success.

You’ll learn how philosophy influences everything around us, the main reason why everyone needs a wall of gratitude, the lasting impact of small continuous steps and why celebrating your achievements can motivate you to achieve more. Let Jim and Zig infuse your spirit with this motivational pick-me-up!

episodes.title: Episode 002: An Interview with John O’Leary
episodes.summary: John O’Leary has lived through worse than most can imagine. At the age of nine, John was severely burned on 100% of his body. No one expected him to survive the first night. But he did. He then survived months in a hospital bed, dozens of surgeries, and years of therapy. Before his tenth birthday, John lost all of his fingers to amputation.

episodes.title: Episode 001: The Mindset, Motivation and Methodology of Success
episodes.summary: There are commonalities to success – in all walks of life. Brian will explore those traits and how you can develop the attitude of a winner each and every day! This introduction to “The Brian Buffini Show” will explore the mindset, motivation and methodology we all need to be successful.
